title: Why is Riot not fixing their servers? Are they really that lazy?
body: I was playing lux and i was 4/2 in ranked, but everything started lagging as if I had bad ping. It said 80 which was acceptable, but it still lagged! Unacceptable!!! I knew it wasnt me because google was working fine. I tried to exit out of the client and restart it only to find that it wont even log me in again! I guess it's fine now because I'm probably not going to play again, but I just want to let Riot know that they need to start fixing their servers and stop make innocent players suffer. Thanks

replies.body: as a person who got banned and been playing the game for years I can tell you riot doesn't give a fuc dude.... lol I got banned cuz a premade 5 man team all reported me after a game :)) but riot doesn't look into that FUN!

We did start to notice some issues with players on Charter Spectrum having issues with being able to login, and it sounds like that disconnect might have happened right in the middle of this. We're still tracking this login issue but it does seem like it's starting to resolve. You can help us track the problem [**over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/EdHm3dWu-105-unable-to-loginstuck-at-authenticating) if you're still having problems!
